'China Resources Cement Holdings Limited' ('CRC') (), parented by China
Resources, is a leading cement and concrete producer in Southern China. It is
the largest NSP clinker and cement producer in Southern China by production
capacity and the second largest concrete producer in China by sales
volume. [http://www.irasia.com/listco/hk/crcement/profile.htm China
Resources Cement Holdings Limited] [http://www.linkedin.com/companies/china-resources-cement-
holdings-limited China Resources Cement Holdings Limited] It was
established in 2003 and incorporated in Cayman Islands.
categories: Companies listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange
Warrants issued in Hong Kong Stock Exchange
